channel.title: Deep Learning on Roland de Boo
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Roland de Boo

item.title: Infrastructure for Deep Learning
item.description: Infrastructure for Deep Learning Last year I freed up some time to follow along with the MOOC “Practical Deep Learning for Coders” at fast.ai. It’s a great introduction if you want to dive right into the material and get your hands dirty. However, I am a little allergic to statements like “it only requires 7 lines of code!” so the example notebooks are too magical for my taste. I quickly found myself peeling off the layers of abstraction and digging into the utility classes.
